text:
An enhancment for the Form Editor: Images and the Title of the asset
appear in the form editor. I applied changes to the follwing files         

- usecase.xmap
  Add a parameter for the form-layout.xsl in order to have the approprate path.
  see file form-layout.xsl

- unizh-common.xsl
  delete the select attribute for the object and asset node. In that case the
edit
  symbol disapear in the form editor  for the object/asset element.
  Assing the data/src attribute to the value attribute.

- Add file form-layout.xsl to
/lenya/lenya/pubs/unicom/lenya/xslt/authoring/edit/
  overwrite the content template (this can be integrated in
  /lenya/lenya/xslt/authoring/edit/form-layout.xsl if needed.
creator: jann.forrer@id.unizh.ch
jann.forrer@id.unizh.ch
